title: QU4RTZ Is Full of Energy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Ahem, everyone. Today is finally the day of the QU4RTZ event! Are you ready!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>We’re all set~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, right.... I have something for you guys.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s special drink level 4.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Gah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hiiii~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I want some! Thanks for the drink~! *Gulp gulp*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Awawa.... What’s going to happen to Emma-senpai today....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm.... Let’s just keep an eye on her for now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>There’s nothing to worry about. She’ll just be full of energy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
